scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack --config build/webpack.production.js --mode production --progress --profile --bail
scripts.deploy: npm run deployHtml && npm run deployJson
scripts.deployHtml: aws s3api put-object --bucket $AWS_S3_BUCKET --key index.html --body dist/index.html --content-type text/html --storage-class STANDARD_IA
scripts.deployJson: aws s3api put-object --bucket $AWS_S3_BUCKET --key app.js --body dist/app.js --content-type application/json --storage-class STANDARD_IA
